name: Pro*C Source Code File
summary: Learn about .PC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Pro*C allows both SQL and C/C++ to be written in the same source code files and compiled into a program. The Pro*C precompiler transforms SQL statements into C/C++ code and then compiles it with the already existing C/C++ code.

description: Source code file written in Pro*C, an embedded SQL language used with the Oracle RDBMS database software; can contain both C/C++ source code statements as well as SQL code; used for writing database applications that combine the power of both SQL and C/C++.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pc file in GitHub Atom
images.caption: PC file open in GitHub Atom
